tweets.text: @IronbridgeAAC @lucyallan @EnvAgency Signs coming down.

@DefraGovUK You need to enforce too!! 

Get ALL those rivers & streams actively monitored 24/7 using advanced electronic monitoring. 

Too many farmers AND water companies being let off the hook. 

#PolluterPays #CleanRivers

How many face coverings did you see littered on your last beach walk?

Litter spoils the places we enjoy and can make its way into the sea and possibly harm marine life.

Bring a bag for your #litter when you go outdoors and take it home to dispose of.

#BinIt4Beaches https://t.co/5XocwdLO82

Bearing in mind that the 30-minute peak in the previous monitoring exercise was 44.5, it‚Äôs clear my constituents are being subjected to a major and ongoing environmental incident.
